name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_deposit_start_date_day
title: On what date would you like to begin the timing of your obligations to deposit Earnest Money as specified in the offer?
label: Earnest Deposit Date
description: This date determines when your earnest money deposit obligations begin. This is separate from other timing requirements in the purchase agreement and specifically relates to when you must provide the earnest money deposit to escrow.
tips: Deposit typically goes into the purchase Escrow Acccount within a day or two after Acceptance takes place.
small_print: The selected date will be the official start of your earnest money deposit obligations under the purchase agreement.

internal.notes: Date selection for earnest money deposit obligations

contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_de.name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_deposit_start_date_day
contingency_sell_buyer_property_offer_de.tooltip: Select the earnest money deposit start date
